About

Alex Gibson is a front end developer living in Newcastle upon Tyne, United Kingdom. As well as this blog, you can also find Alex on:

  • GitHub
  • Twitter
  • Zerply
  • Coderwall

Alex also helps out as a co-maintainer on Mobile Boilerplate.

Colophon

  • This site is built using Jekyll and hosted on GitHub Pages.
  • Normalize.css is used as a baseline for cross browser CSS defaults.
  • Sass & Compass are used to author the site CSS.
  • Pygments provides syntax highlighting.
